mapper.insert: insert into cart(cartid , usersid , bookid , num , price ) values(#{cartid} , #{usersid} , #{bookid} , #{num} , #{price} )
mapper.select: select a.* , b.username , c.bookname , c.image from cart a , users b , book c where 1=1 and a.usersid = b.usersid and a.bookid = c.bookid order by cartid desc
select a.* , b.username , c.bookname , c.image from cart a , users b , book c where 1=1 and a.usersid = b.usersid and a.bookid = c.bookid and cartid=#{cartid} order by cartid desc

select a.* , b.username , c.bookname , c.image from cart a , users b , book c where 1=1 and a.usersid = b.usersid and a.bookid = c.bookid
and a.usersid like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{usersid}, '%'))
and a.bookid like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{bookid}, '%'))
and a.num like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{num}, '%'))
and a.price like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{price}, '%'))
